text: is a Japanese physicist. He is known for his work on CP-violation. He won the 2008 Nobel Prize in Physics "for the discovery of the origin of the broken symmetry which predicts the existence of at least three families of quarks in nature." ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese physicists Category:Nagoya University alumni Category:Kyoto University faculty
title: Makoto Kobayashi (physicist)
